Uses of Package
Exceptions

Packages that use Exceptions
Package
Description
Controller
 
  • Classes in Exceptions used by Controller
    Class
    Description
    MaxEnrollmentCourseException
    this class implements the exception for the limit of enrolled Students for a course
    StudentAlreadyEnrolled
    this class implements the exception for Students that want to register to a course,to whom they already enrolled
    StudentCreditsOverflowException
    this class implements the exception for the limit of available Credits for each Student
    UnAuthorizedDeleteCourseException
    this class implements the exception for a teacher that wants to delete a course, which he did not create
    UnAuthorizedEditCourseException
    this class implements the exception for not having permission to edit the course, if the teacher did not create it
